swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator.automaton

Class Dfa<I extends Item,S extends AState<I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator.automaton.Dfa<I,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - The item type the states consists of
    S - The states type of this automaton

    public class Dfa<I extends Item,S extends AState<I>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A deterministic finite automaton (DFA) as a interim step for the generation of parsing tables. Generators create DFAs first from the grammar, which are then converted to actions by moving along their edges.
    Author:
    Gero
